intent_atoms.description: Configure performance benchmarks for large files
Add PerformanceBenchmarkConfiguration with environment-tunable payload sizes, iteration counts, and slack multipliers scaled from NFR throughput targets
Introduce LargeFileBenchmarkTests exercising CLI validation throughput and SwiftUI bridge latency via XCTest metrics harnesses and a reusable large-fixture generator
Run swift test to execute full test suite including new performance benchmarks, with UI latency benchmark skipping automatically when Combine is unavailable

functional_units.name: PerformanceBenchmarkConfiguration
functional_units.description: Configures environment-tunable payload sizes, iteration counts, and slack multipliers for large file performance benchmarks based on NFR throughput targets.

functional_units.name: LargeFileBenchmarkTests
functional_units.description: Executes CLI validation throughput tests and, when Combine is available, SwiftUI bridge latency tests using XCTest metrics harnesses with a reusable large-fixture generator.

functional_units.name: CLI Validation Throughput Benchmark
functional_units.description: Measures the system's command-line interface throughput for processing large files.

functional_units.name: SwiftUI Bridge Latency Benchmark
functional_units.description: Measures latency of the SwiftUI bridge when Combine is available, using XCTest metrics harnesses.

functional_units.name: Automated Benchmark Execution via swift test
functional_units.description: Runs the full test suite including performance benchmarks automatically through the 'swift test' command.
